abstract: Comcast said Monday it would pay $570 million for an interest in two regional cable sports networks, one in San Francisco and the other in New England. In a cash transaction withRainbow Media Holdings, Comcast will purchase a 60 percent interest in FSN Bay Area and a 50 percent interest in FSN New England.
lead_paragraph: Comcast said Monday it would pay $570 million for an interest in two regional cable sports networks, one in San Francisco and the other in New England. In a cash transaction withRainbow Media Holdings, Comcast will purchase a 60 percent interest in FSN Bay Area and a 50 percent interest in FSN New England.

headline.main: Comcast Takes Stake in Cable Networks
